_header: A countenance of travail without resting Custodi solicite
_description: Three benefits of a pure soul(?), in a Latin sermon — three monorhyming lines interspersed with Latin warnings

CULKk424.Transcription:
A countenaunce of trauayle wyt oute restyng Custodi solicitea
                    gret comfort in trauaylyng Custodi solicite teipsumA parfyte
                    euerlestynge custodire animam tuam
